typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies
Movies derive(year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),
		title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6))) ~> MoviesYear
MoviesYear filter(1 == 2) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['mynewmovies.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Output
